mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACM_SYS_USER_RULE( ID, UID, MID, FUN_CODE, REMARK ) VALUES( #{id}, #{uid}, #{mid}, #{funCode}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, UID as uid, MID as mid, FUN_CODE as funCode, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM ACM_SYS_USER_RULE c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, UID as uid, MID as mid, FUN_CODE as funCode, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM ACM_SYS_USER_RULE c ORDER BY createTime DESC limit #{page.pageSize} offset #{page.offset}
